Included relationships:
* creator

If the favorite is valid, it will return the current user. If not, it will return the favorite. If the resource has already been favorited, the server will respond with a 422 code and a message that the resource is already taken.

post.summary: Retrieve an authentication token
post.description:
Included relationships:
* favorites

Returns all information about the user (as well as a login token) when given the proper username and password.

The meta tag containing the authToken exists at the top level in the response like so:
{ "data": {}, "meta": {"authToken": "...."}, "included": [] }

Returns an array of Version resources.

objectChanges.description:
Each key contains an array of values that describe how that project has changed over time. This could be a history of changes for the project regarding title, description, slug, etc.
For example: "featured": [ false, true ]\nThis means the project was changed from "not featured" to "featured"

actorName.description: The name of the user that made the change

actorId.description: The ID of the user that made the change

itemDisplayName.description: The name displayed on the card for this event in history
